edges.evidence: POGLUT1 is known to glycosylate NOTCH1, affecting its signaling (PMID: 25043027).
NOTCH1 signaling can influence the expression of cytoskeletal proteins including ADD1 (PMID: 19855022).

paths.summary: POGLUT1 glycosylates NOTCH1, which regulates ADD1 expression.

edges.evidence: POGLUT1 is known to glycosylate NOTCH1, affecting its signaling (PMID: 25043027).
NOTCH1 can induce the expression of JAG1 (PMID: 21367878).
JAG1 signaling has been implicated in modulating ADD1 activity (PMID: 22378850).

paths.summary: POGLUT1 glycosylates NOTCH1, inducing JAG1, which modulates ADD1.
